tool_description: Compares shipping rates across multiple carriers and services, ranking options by cost, speed, and reliability factors.

rate_quotes.description: Array of rate quote identifiers to compare

sort_priority.description: Primary sorting criteria: cost, speed, reliability, or balanced

preferred_carriers.description: List of preferred carriers to prioritize

exclude_carriers.description: List of carriers to exclude from comparison

error_messages: No rate quotes provided: At least one rate quote identifier must be provided
Invalid rate quotes: One or more rate quote identifiers not found
Invalid sort priority: Must be 'cost', 'speed', 'reliability', or 'balanced'
Invalid constraints: max_transit_days must be positive integer, max_cost must be positive number
No viable options: All quotes exceed specified constraints
Conflicting preferences: preferred_carriers and exclude_carriers contain overlapping carriers
usage: Provide array of rate_quotes to compare. Optionally set sort_priority, constraints (max_transit_days, max_cost), and carrier preferences. Returns ranked comparison results.

ranked_options.description: Ranked list of shipping options with carrier:service:cost:transit

total_options_compared.description: Number of options included in comparison
